author: CBC News
title: Georgia governor slammed for not knowing aymptomatic people could transmit virus
description: Georgia Gov. Brian Kemp announced a shelter-in-place order on Wednesday and ordered public schools closed to prevent the spread of COVID-19. He said he didn't know until this week that the asymptomatic "could have been infecting people before they ever felt b…
content:
Georgia's shelter-in-place order will be published Thursday and go into effect the following day, but the state's governor is taking heat for his justification for resorting to the measure.
